name: ORDER_IMPRESSION
description: This table stores impression information for a procedure.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the reading physician's impression.

columns.name: IMPRESSION
columns.description: The reading physician's impression for this procedure.

columns.name: ORD_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date each order was placed in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date the order was placed. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple orders on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The calendar date that the order was placed.
